463310.name: So Long Earth Soundtrack
463310.description:
Dom journey's soundtrack is filled with music of many genres: Ranging from acoustic big band jazz to African drums, electronic beats and even a little bit of metal.
As your hear the different themes, you will remember all the interesting personalities presented in the game: people, creatures and their planets.
463310.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
